mapper.insert: insert into driver (id, supplier_id, truck_id, name, phone_number, id_number, status, driving_licence_type, driving_licence_number, remark, create_time, create_user, last_update_time, last_update_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{truckId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{drivingLicenceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drivingLicenceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
